game.title: Frozen Destiny: The Epic Journey of Elise
game.summary: Join Elise on a perilous quest as she embarks on a frozen-themed adventure filled with hope, epic battles, and unexpected twists.
game.world_setting: In a mystical world where icy landscapes and snow-covered mountains dominate, Elise must navigate through treacherous terrain to fulfill her destiny.

main_character.name: Elise
main_character.description: A determined and courageous warrior with a heart of ice, Elise is destined to save her frozen world from an ancient evil.

characters.name: Lucinda
characters.description: A powerful sorceress who can control the elements, Lucinda aids Elise on her quest with her mastery over ice magic.
dialogue: I'm Lucinda. I've been waiting for you.
I'm here to help you on your quest.

characters.name: Vornir
characters.description: The ruthless Ice King who seeks to plunge the world into eternal winter, standing in Elise's way with his icy minions.
dialogue: I'm Vornir. I've been waiting for you.

characters.name: Thalia
characters.description: A mysterious merchant who traverses the frozen lands, offering magical artifacts and valuable information to Elise along her journey.
dialogue: I'm Thalia. I've been waiting for you.
I'm here to help you on your quest.

characters.name: Frost Guardian
characters.description: Ancient ice guardians that protect the Frozen Citadel with their frozen spears and chilling presence.
dialogue: I'm Frost Guardian. I've been waiting for you.

characters.name: Forest Spirit
characters.description: Mystical spirits of the frozen forest who test the resolve of those who enter their domain.
dialogue: I'm Forest Spirit. I've been waiting for you.
I'm here to help you on your quest.

characters.name: Blizzard Wolf
characters.description: Fierce wolves that hunt in the blizzard peaks, their howls echoing through the frozen winds.
dialogue: I'm Blizzard Wolf. I've been waiting for you.

characters.name: Ice Cavern Troll
characters.description: Massive trolls that dwell in the ice caverns, wielding clubs made of frozen stone.
dialogue: I'm Ice Cavern Troll. I've been waiting for you.

scenes.title: The Frozen Citadel
scenes.setting: Elise arrives at the Frozen Citadel, a massive ice fortress where Vornir, the Ice King, resides.

scenes.title: The Frozen Forest
scenes.setting: Elise ventures into the Frozen Forest, where ancient spirits roam and icy creatures lurk in the shadows.

scenes.title: The Blizzard Peak
scenes.setting: Elise climbs the treacherous Blizzard Peak, where howling winds and blizzards threaten to throw her off course.

scenes.title: The Ice Caverns
scenes.setting: Elise delves into the deep Ice Caverns, where Vornir's minions await with frosty claws and icy traps.

scenes.title: The Frozen Throne Room
scenes.setting: Elise confronts Vornir in his Frozen Throne Room, where the final battle for the fate of the frozen world unfolds.

skills.name: Glacial Shards
skills.effect: Summon sharp icicles to pierce enemies

skills.name: Frozen Avalanche
skills.effect: Create a massive snowstorm to freeze all foes in an area

skills.name: Ice Shield
skills.effect: Raise a barrier of ice to protect allies from enemy attacks

skills.name: Blizzard Formation
skills.effect: Command allies to form a defensive circle amidst a blizzard

skills.name: Chilling Resolve
skills.effect: Boost Elise's resilience against frost-based attacks

skills.name: Heroic Sacrifice
skills.effect: Sacrifice Elise's health to empower a devastating ice-based attack

weapons.name: Frostbite Axe
weapons.description: A fearsome axe imbued with icy magic, capable of freezing foes with each strike.

weapons.name: Snowstorm Bow
weapons.description: A bow crafted from enchanted ice, shooting arrows that summon blizzards upon impact.

weapons.name: Glacial Spear
weapons.description: A spear tipped with razor-sharp ice shards, piercing through armor with ease.

cutscenes.title: The Awakening
cutscenes.description: Elise discovers her icy powers and embarks on a quest to save her frozen world from the malevolent Ice King, Vornir.

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.line: My destiny calls to me, a frozen path I must tread. The Ice King's grip must be broken.

dialogue.speaker: Lucinda
dialogue.line: You are the hope of our world, Elise. Embrace your powers and journey forth with courage.

cutscenes.title: The Frozen Alliance
cutscenes.description: Elise forms an unlikely alliance with powerful allies, Lucinda the sorceress and Thalia the wandering merchant, to confront the Ice King's icy reign.

dialogue.speaker: Thalia
dialogue.line: Together, we shall defy the frost's grasp and bring warmth back to these lands.

dialogue.speaker: Lucinda
dialogue.line: United, we can shatter the Ice King's throne and restore balance to our world.

cutscenes.title: The Frozen Revelation
cutscenes.description: Elise uncovers the truth behind Vornir's tyranny, revealing a twisted plot that threatens to plunge the world into eternal winter.

dialogue.speaker: Vornir
dialogue.line: You have no idea of the power you meddle with, Elise. Prepare for the icy embrace of a world frozen in time...

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.line: The truth may freeze my heart, but my resolve remains unyielding. The Ice King's reign ends now!
